com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.job

Class PollingJobStatusRunnable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.job.PollingJobStatusRunnable<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type that will be returned if the job complete successfully
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class PollingJobStatusRunnable<T>
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Runnable which will poll the HP Haven OnDemand job status API until the job has finished or failed

                        HodJobCallback<T> callback,

        Creates a new PollingJobStatusRunnable using a token provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        jobId - The ID of the job
        callback - The callback that will be called with the result
        executorService - The executor service responsible for running the runnable

      • PollingJobStatusRunnable

        public PollingJobStatusRunnable(TokenProxy tokenProxy,

                        HodJobCallback<T> callback,
                        ScheduledExecutorService executorService,
                        JobService<? extends JobStatus<T>> jobService)
        Creates a new PollingJobStatusRunnable using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy used to submit the job
        jobId - The ID of the job
        callback - The callback that will be called with the result
        executorService - The executor service responsible for running the runnable

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Checks the status of the job. If the job has not finished, the runnable will schedule itself to run again after a short wait
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
